name: qr-secret-decoder-ring
title: QR Secret Decoder Ring
author: Brett Zamir
description: Right click an image containing a QR code to decode. Allows choice of the ZXing and MiniQR websites for handling the decoding. MiniQR makes a public URL but conveniently converts URLs to links. Currently does not work with local files.

preferences.description: The site to handle QR Code decoding of right-clicked images. Note that MiniQR creates a public URL for your submitted QR.
preferences.name: decoderSite
preferences.title: Decoder Site
